subject: Re: cleaning up after a whole test suite (junit4)
msgSnippet: ... See http://tech.groups.yahoo.com/group/junit/message/20668 Junit 3 suite setup tear down
messageBody:
--- In junit@yahoogroups.com, Malte Finsterwalder <malte@...> wrote:
>
> Hi there,
>
> is there a way to run cleanup code after all test are run?
> I sometimes have some setup that I want done once before any test is
> run. This is easy with a lazy init.
> But how do I tear it down again?
>
> In JUnit 3 there was a possibility to wrap a suite.
> How is this done in JUnit 4?
>
> Greetings,
> Malte
>
See http://tech.groups.yahoo.com/group/junit/message/20668 "Junit 3
suite setup tear down"
